descriptions:
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Archer Tower:</size></color>
  Shoots at a high speed. Allowing for rapid attacks.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Archer Tower:</size></color>
  Arrows apply a damage-over-time effect, steadily reducing the enemy's health.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Mage tower:</size></color>
  The Magic Ball hits the target and continues to deal damage over time.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Mage tower:</size></color>
  The Magic Ball deals damage over time and slows the enemy's movement.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Cannon Tower:</size></color>
  Bombs explode on impact. Dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Cannon Tower:</size></color>
  Bombs deal greater damage, making them more effective against groups of enemies.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Barrack:</size></color>
   Summons three swordsmen to fight against incoming enemies.

<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Barrack:</size></color>
   Summons three knights who heal themselves and allies when not engaged in combat.
